articles.title: Covid-19: South Africa records 1 735 new infections and 26 deaths - News24
articles.description: South Africa has recorded 1 735 new Covid-19 infections, which represents a 5.8% positivity rate. The National Institute for Communicable Diseases says 26 new Covid-19-related deaths have also been recorded.
articles.content:
• South Africa recorded 1 735 new Covid-19 cases on Saturday.
  • 26 new deaths have been reported, bringing the confirmed death toll to 99 543.
  • Most new cases on Saturday were reco… [+1622 chars]

articles.title: South Africa is the most obese country in Africa - Doctor - 702

articles.title: Saturday's weather: Heavy rainfall expected across the country - News24
articles.description: The South African Weather Service has issued a yellow level 2 warning for disruptive rainfall over the central and western parts of Free State, western parts of the North West, and north-eastern parts of the Northern Cape.
